Field.name: DateTimePeriodFormatQualifier
Field.comment: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

Field.name: DateTimePeriod
Field.comment: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

Field.name: GenderCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the sex of the individual

Field.name: MaritalStatusCode
Field.comment: Code defining the marital status of a person

Field.name: CompositeRaceOrEthnicityInformation
Field.comment: To send general and detailed information on race or ethnicity

Field.name: BasisOfVerificationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the basis of verification

Field.name: CodeListQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a specific industry code list

Field.name: IndustryCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list
